title: 73/216.  Observer status for the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank in the General Assembly
text:
United Nations 
A/RES/73/216
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
11 January 2019 
 
18-22535 (E)    150119     
*1822535* 
 
 
Seventy-third session 
Agenda item 177 
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly 
on 20 December 2018 
 
 
 
 
[on the report of the Sixth Committee (A/73/464)] 
 
 
 73/216.  Observer status for the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank 
in the General Assembly 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Wishing to promote cooperation between the United Nations and the Asian 
Infrastructure Investment Bank, 
 
1. 
Decides to invite the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank to participate 
in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer; 
 
2. 
Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement 
the present resolution. 
 
62nd plenary meeting  
20 December 2018

paragraphs.1: Decides to invite the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank to participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer;
paragraphs.2: Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement the present resolution.
